name: The Crown of Ariiance
overview: Another time, East of Andromeda... The planet of Ariiance was a happy place, or so it seemed. The two major countries, Keriiod and Febronce managed an uneasy peace, but underneath this facade lay a deep hate for each other. All went well until on e day when the Febronce and Keriiod leaders fell into a dispute. From that moment on, the countries were at war. The war raged for many years without a result until the two leaders reached an agreement. If one of them could conquer more than half the alliance, the rest of the land would be forfeited to them. And so it was...
